delete_modal.text: Are you sure to delete the plugin {name} ?

list.switch_warning: Switching services will reset unsaved changes

actions.warning: Need at least a valid server name to save.

general.name: General
general.description: The general settings for the server

IS_LOADING.help: Internal use : set to yes when BW is loading.
IS_LOADING.label: internal use

NGINX_PREFIX.help: Where nginx will search for configurations.
NGINX_PREFIX.label: nginx prefix

HTTP_PORT.help: HTTP port number which bunkerweb binds to.
HTTP_PORT.label: HTTP port

HTTPS_PORT.help: HTTPS port number which bunkerweb binds to.
HTTPS_PORT.label: HTTPS port

SERVER_NAME.help: List of the virtual hosts served by bunkerweb.
SERVER_NAME.label: Server name

WORKER_RLIMIT_NOFILE.help: Maximum number of open files for worker processes.
WORKER_RLIMIT_NOFILE.label: Open files per worker

WORKER_CONNECTIONS.help: Maximum number of connections per worker.
WORKER_CONNECTIONS.label: Connections per worker

LOG_FORMAT.help: The format to use for access logs.
LOG_FORMAT.label: Log format

LOG_LEVEL.help: The level to use for error logs.
LOG_LEVEL.label: Log level

DNS_RESOLVERS.help: DNS addresses of resolvers to use.
DNS_RESOLVERS.label: DNS resolvers

USE_API.help: Activate the API to control BunkerWeb.
USE_API.label: Activate API

API_HTTP_PORT.help: Listen port number for the API.
API_HTTP_PORT.label: API port number

API_LISTEN_IP.help: Listen IP address for the API.
API_LISTEN_IP.label: API listen IP

API_SERVER_NAME.help: Server name (virtual host) for the API.
API_SERVER_NAME.label: API server name

API_WHITELIST_IP.help: List of IP/network allowed to contact the API.
API_WHITELIST_IP.label: API whitelist IP

reversescan.name: Reverse scan
reversescan.description: Scan clients ports to detect proxies or servers.

USE_REVERSE_SCAN.help: Enable scanning of clients ports and deny access if one is opened.
USE_REVERSE_SCAN.label: Reverse scan

REVERSE_SCAN_PORTS.help: List of port to scan when using reverse scan feature.
REVERSE_SCAN_PORTS.label: Reverse scan ports

REVERSE_SCAN_TIMEOUT.help: Specify the maximum timeout (in ms) when scanning a port.
REVERSE_SCAN_TIMEOUT.label: Reverse scan timeout

whitelist.name: Whitelist
whitelist.description: Allow access based on internal and external IP/network/rDNS/ASN whitelists.

WHITELIST_IP.help: List of IP/network, separated with spaces, to put into the whitelist.
WHITELIST_IP.label: Whitelist IP/network

WHITELIST_IP_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing good IP/network to whitelist.
WHITELIST_IP_URLS.label: Whitelist IP/network URLs

WHITELIST_RDNS_GLOBAL.help: Only perform RDNS whitelist checks on global IP addresses.
WHITELIST_RDNS_GLOBAL.label: Whitelist reverse DNS global IPs

WHITELIST_RDNS.help: List of reverse DNS suffixes, separated with spaces, to whitelist.
WHITELIST_RDNS.label: Whitelist reverse DNS

WHITELIST_RDNS_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing reverse DNS suffixes to whitelist.
WHITELIST_RDNS_URLS.label: Whitelist reverse DNS URLs

WHITELIST_ASN.help: List of ASN numbers, separated with spaces, to whitelist.
WHITELIST_ASN.label: Whitelist ASN

WHITELIST_ASN_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing ASN to whitelist.
WHITELIST_ASN_URLS.label: Whitelist ASN URLs

WHITELIST_USER_AGENT.help: List of User-Agent (PCRE regex), separated with spaces, to whitelist.
WHITELIST_USER_AGENT.label: Whitelist User-Agent

WHITELIST_USER_AGENT_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing good User-Agent to whitelist.
WHITELIST_USER_AGENT_URLS.label: Whitelist User-Agent URLs

WHITELIST_URI.help: List of URI (PCRE regex), separated with spaces, to whitelist.
WHITELIST_URI.label: Whitelist URI

WHITELIST_URI_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing bad URI to whitelist.
WHITELIST_URI_URLS.label: Whitelist URI URLs

greylist.name: Greylist
greylist.description: Allow access while keeping security features based on internal and external IP/network/rDNS/ASN greylists.

GREYLIST_IP.help: List of IP/network, separated with spaces, to put into the greylist.
GREYLIST_IP.label: Greylist IP/network

GREYLIST_IP_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing good IP/network to put into the greylist.
GREYLIST_IP_URLS.label: Greylist IP/network URLs

GREYLIST_RDNS_GLOBAL.help: Only perform RDNS greylist checks on global IP addresses.
GREYLIST_RDNS_GLOBAL.label: Greylist reverse DNS global IPs

GREYLIST_RDNS.help: List of reverse DNS suffixes, separated with spaces, to put into the greylist.
GREYLIST_RDNS.label: Greylist reverse DNS

GREYLIST_RDNS_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing reverse DNS suffixes to put into the greylist.
GREYLIST_RDNS_URLS.label: Greylist reverse DNS URLs

GREYLIST_ASN.help: List of ASN numbers, separated with spaces, to put into the greylist.
GREYLIST_ASN.label: Greylist ASN

GREYLIST_ASN_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing ASN to put into the greylist.
GREYLIST_ASN_URLS.label: Greylist ASN URLs

GREYLIST_USER_AGENT.help: List of User-Agent (PCRE regex), separated with spaces, to put into the greylist.
GREYLIST_USER_AGENT.label: Greylist User-Agent

GREYLIST_USER_AGENT_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing good User-Agent to put into the greylist.
GREYLIST_USER_AGENT_URLS.label: Greylist User-Agent URLs

GREYLIST_URI.help: List of URI (PCRE regex), separated with spaces, to put into the greylist.
GREYLIST_URI.label: Greylist URI

GREYLIST_URI_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing bad URI to put into the greylist.
GREYLIST_URI_URLS.label: Greylist URI URLs

headers.name: Headers
headers.description: Manage HTTP headers sent to clients.

KEEP_UPSTREAM_HEADERS.help: Headers to keep from upstream (Header1 Header2 Header3 ... or * for all).
KEEP_UPSTREAM_HEADERS.label: Keep upstream headers

COOKIE_FLAGS.help: Cookie flags automatically added to all cookies (value accepted for nginx_cookie_flag_module).
COOKIE_FLAGS.label: Cookie flags

COOKIE_AUTO_SECURE_FLAG.help: Automatically add the Secure flag to all cookies.
COOKIE_AUTO_SECURE_FLAG.label: Cookie auto Secure flag

CONTENT_SECURITY_POLICY_REPORT_ONLY.help: Send reports for violations of the Content-Security-Policy header instead of blocking them.
CONTENT_SECURITY_POLICY_REPORT_ONLY.label: Content-Security-Policy-Report-Only

inject.name: HTML injection
inject.description: Inject custom HTML code before the </body> tag.

gzip.name: Gzip
gzip.description: Compress HTTP requests with the gzip algorithm.

GZIP_TYPES.help: List of MIME types that will be compressed with gzip.
GZIP_TYPES.label: MIME types

GZIP_COMP_LEVEL.help: The compression level of the gzip algorithm.
GZIP_COMP_LEVEL.label: Compression level

ERRORS.help: List of HTTP error code and corresponding error pages, separated with spaces (404=/my404.html 403=/errors/403.html ...).
ERRORS.label: Errors

INTERCEPTED_ERROR_CODES.help: List of HTTP error code intercepted by Bunkerweb
INTERCEPTED_ERROR_CODES.label: Intercepted error codes

DATABASE_URI.help: The database URI, following the sqlalchemy format.
DATABASE_URI.label: The database URI

DATABASE_MAX_JOBS_RUNS.help: The maximum number of jobs runs to keep in the database.
DATABASE_MAX_JOBS_RUNS.label: The maximum number of jobs runs to keep in the database

DATABASE_MAX_ACTIONS.help: The maximum number of actions to keep in the database.
DATABASE_MAX_ACTIONS.label: The maximum number of actions to keep in the database

REMOTE_PHP.help: Hostname of the remote PHP-FPM instance.
REMOTE_PHP.label: Remote PHP

REMOTE_PHP_PATH.help: Root folder containing files in the remote PHP-FPM instance.
REMOTE_PHP_PATH.label: Remote PHP path

LOCAL_PHP.help: Path to the PHP-FPM socket file.
LOCAL_PHP.label: Local PHP

LOCAL_PHP_PATH.help: Root folder containing files in the local PHP-FPM instance.
LOCAL_PHP_PATH.label: Local PHP path

country.name: Country
country.description: Deny access based on the country of the client IP.

BLACKLIST_COUNTRY.help: Deny access if the country of the client is in the list (2 letters code).
BLACKLIST_COUNTRY.label: Country blacklist

WHITELIST_COUNTRY.help: Deny access if the country of the client is not in the list (2 letters code).
WHITELIST_COUNTRY.label: Country whitelist

limit.name: Limit
limit.description: Limit maximum number of requests and connections.

LIMIT_REQ_URL.help: URL (PCRE regex) where the limit request will be applied or special value / for all requests.
LIMIT_REQ_URL.label: Limit request URL

LIMIT_REQ_RATE.help: Rate to apply to the URL (s for second, m for minute, h for hour and d for day).
LIMIT_REQ_RATE.label: Limit request Rate

LIMIT_CONN_MAX_HTTP1.help: Maximum number of connections per IP when using HTTP/1.X protocol.
LIMIT_CONN_MAX_HTTP1.label: Maximum number of HTTP/1.X connections

LIMIT_CONN_MAX_HTTP2.help: Maximum number of streams per IP when using HTTP/2 protocol.
LIMIT_CONN_MAX_HTTP2.label: Maximum number of HTTP/2 streams

LIMIT_CONN_MAX_STREAM.help: Maximum number of connections per IP when using stream.
LIMIT_CONN_MAX_STREAM.label: Maximum number of stream connections

REDIRECT_TO.help: Redirect a whole site to another one.
REDIRECT_TO.label: Redirect to

REDIRECT_TO_REQUEST_URI.help: Append the requested URI to the redirect address.
REDIRECT_TO_REQUEST_URI.label: Append request URI

REDIRECT_TO_STATUS_CODE.help: Status code to send to client when redirecting.
REDIRECT_TO_STATUS_CODE.label: Append request URI

blacklist.name: Blacklist
blacklist.description: Deny access based on internal and external IP/network/rDNS/ASN blacklists.

BLACKLIST_IP.help: List of IP/network, separated with spaces, to block.
BLACKLIST_IP.label: Blacklist IP/network

BLACKLIST_IP_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing bad IP/network to block.
BLACKLIST_IP_URLS.label: Blacklist IP/network URLs

BLACKLIST_RDNS_GLOBAL.help: Only perform RDNS blacklist checks on global IP addresses.
BLACKLIST_RDNS_GLOBAL.label: Blacklist reverse DNS global IPs

BLACKLIST_RDNS.help: List of reverse DNS suffixes, separated with spaces, to block.
BLACKLIST_RDNS.label: Blacklist reverse DNS

BLACKLIST_RDNS_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing reverse DNS suffixes to block.
BLACKLIST_RDNS_URLS.label: Blacklist reverse DNS URLs

BLACKLIST_ASN.help: List of ASN numbers, separated with spaces, to block.
BLACKLIST_ASN.label: Blacklist ASN

BLACKLIST_ASN_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing ASN to block.
BLACKLIST_ASN_URLS.label: Blacklist ASN URLs

BLACKLIST_USER_AGENT.help: List of User-Agent (PCRE regex), separated with spaces, to block.
BLACKLIST_USER_AGENT.label: Blacklist User-Agent

BLACKLIST_USER_AGENT_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing bad User-Agent to block.
BLACKLIST_USER_AGENT_URLS.label: Blacklist User-Agent URLs

BLACKLIST_URI.help: List of URI (PCRE regex), separated with spaces, to block.
BLACKLIST_URI.label: Blacklist URI

BLACKLIST_URI_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing bad URI to block.
BLACKLIST_URI_URLS.label: Blacklist URI URLs

BLACKLIST_IGNORE_IP.help: List of IP/network, separated with spaces, to ignore in the blacklist.
BLACKLIST_IGNORE_IP.label: Blacklist ignore IP/network

BLACKLIST_IGNORE_IP_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing IP/network to ignore in the blacklist.
BLACKLIST_IGNORE_IP_URLS.label: Blacklist ignore IP/network URLs

BLACKLIST_IGNORE_RDNS.help: List of reverse DNS suffixes, separated with spaces, to ignore in the blacklist.
BLACKLIST_IGNORE_RDNS.label: Blacklist ignore reverse DNS

BLACKLIST_IGNORE_RDNS_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing reverse DNS suffixes to ignore in the blacklist.
BLACKLIST_IGNORE_RDNS_URLS.label: Blacklist ignore reverse DNS URLs

BLACKLIST_IGNORE_ASN.help: List of ASN numbers, separated with spaces, to ignore in the blacklist.
BLACKLIST_IGNORE_ASN.label: Blacklist ignore ASN

BLACKLIST_IGNORE_ASN_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing ASN to ignore in the blacklist.
BLACKLIST_IGNORE_ASN_URLS.label: Blacklist ignore ASN URLs

BLACKLIST_IGNORE_USER_AGENT.help: List of User-Agent (PCRE regex), separated with spaces, to ignore in the blacklist.
BLACKLIST_IGNORE_USER_AGENT.label: Blacklist ignore User-Agent

BLACKLIST_IGNORE_USER_AGENT_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing User-Agent to ignore in the blacklist.
BLACKLIST_IGNORE_USER_AGENT_URLS.label: Blacklist ignore User-Agent URLs

BLACKLIST_IGNORE_URI.help: List of URI (PCRE regex), separated with spaces, to ignore in the blacklist.
BLACKLIST_IGNORE_URI.label: Blacklist ignore URI

BLACKLIST_IGNORE_URI_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing URI to ignore in the blacklist.
BLACKLIST_IGNORE_URI_URLS.label: Blacklist ignore URI URLs

authbasic.name: Auth basic
authbasic.description: Enforce login before accessing a resource or the whole site using HTTP basic auth method.

AUTH_BASIC_LOCATION.help: URL of the protected resource or sitewide value.
AUTH_BASIC_LOCATION.label: Auth basic Location

redis.name: Redis
redis.description: Redis server configuration when using BunkerWeb in cluster mode.

REDIS_SSL.help: Use SSL/TLS connection with Redis server.
REDIS_SSL.label: Redis SSL/TLS

REDIS_TIMEOUT.help: Redis server timeout (in ms) for connect, read and write.
REDIS_TIMEOUT.label: Redis timeout (ms)

REDIS_KEEPALIVE_IDLE.help: Max idle time (in ms) before closing redis connection in the pool.
REDIS_KEEPALIVE_IDLE.label: Redis keepalive idle (ms)

REDIS_KEEPALIVE_POOL.help: Max number of redis connection(s) kept in the pool.
REDIS_KEEPALIVE_POOL.label: Redis keepalive pool

letsencrypt.name: Let's Encrypt
letsencrypt.description: Automatic creation, renewal and configuration of Let's Encrypt certificates.

EMAIL_LETS_ENCRYPT.help: Email used for Let's Encrypt notification and in certificate.
EMAIL_LETS_ENCRYPT.label: Email Let's Encrypt

USE_LETS_ENCRYPT_STAGING.help: Use the staging environment for Letâ€™s Encrypt certificate generation. Useful when you are testing your deployments to avoid being rate limited in the production environment.
USE_LETS_ENCRYPT_STAGING.label: Use Let's Encrypt Staging

sessions.name: Sessions
sessions.description: Management of session used by other plugins.

SESSIONS_SECRET.help: Secret used to encrypt sessions variables for storing data related to challenges.
SESSIONS_SECRET.label: Sessions secret

SESSIONS_NAME.help: Name of the cookie given to clients.
SESSIONS_NAME.label: Sessions name

SESSIONS_IDLING_TIMEOUT.help: Maximum time (in seconds) of inactivity before the session is invalidated.
SESSIONS_IDLING_TIMEOUT.label: Sessions idling timeout

SESSIONS_ROLLING_TIMEOUT.help: Maximum time (in seconds) before a session must be renewed.
SESSIONS_ROLLING_TIMEOUT.label: Sessions rolling timeout

SESSIONS_ABSOLUTE_TIMEOUT.help: Maximum time (in seconds) before a session is destroyed.
SESSIONS_ABSOLUTE_TIMEOUT.label: Sessions absolute timeout

SESSIONS_CHECK_IP.help: Destroy session if IP address is different than original one.
SESSIONS_CHECK_IP.label: Sessions check IP

SESSIONS_CHECK_USER_AGENT.help: Destroy session if User-Agent is different than original one.
SESSIONS_CHECK_USER_AGENT.label: Sessions check User-Agent

REVERSE_PROXY_HOST.help: Full URL of the proxied resource (proxy_pass).
REVERSE_PROXY_HOST.label: Reverse proxy host

REVERSE_PROXY_URL.help: Location URL that will be proxied.
REVERSE_PROXY_URL.label: Reverse proxy url

REVERSE_PROXY_WS.help: Enable websocket on the proxied resource.
REVERSE_PROXY_WS.label: Reverse proxy WS

REVERSE_PROXY_HEADERS.help: List of HTTP headers to send to proxied resource separated with semicolons (values for proxy_set_header directive).
REVERSE_PROXY_HEADERS.label: Reverse proxy headers

REVERSE_PROXY_HEADERS_CLIENT.help: List of HTTP headers to send to client separated with semicolons (values for add_header directive).
REVERSE_PROXY_HEADERS_CLIENT.label: Reverse proxy headers-client

REVERSE_PROXY_BUFFERING.help: Enable or disable buffering of responses from proxied resource.
REVERSE_PROXY_BUFFERING.label: Reverse proxy buffering

REVERSE_PROXY_KEEPALIVE.help: Enable or disable keepalive connections with the proxied resource.
REVERSE_PROXY_KEEPALIVE.label: Reverse proxy keepalive

REVERSE_PROXY_AUTH_REQUEST.help: Enable authentication using an external provider (value of auth_request directive).
REVERSE_PROXY_AUTH_REQUEST.label: Reverse proxy auth request

REVERSE_PROXY_AUTH_REQUEST_SIGNIN_URL.help: Redirect clients to sign-in URL when using REVERSE_PROXY_AUTH_REQUEST (used when auth_request call returned 401).
REVERSE_PROXY_AUTH_REQUEST_SIGNIN_URL.label: Auth request signin URL

REVERSE_PROXY_AUTH_REQUEST_SET.help: List of variables to set from the authentication provider, separated with semicolons (values of auth_request_set directives).
REVERSE_PROXY_AUTH_REQUEST_SET.label: Reverse proxy auth request set

USE_PROXY_CACHE.help: Enable or disable caching of the proxied resources.
USE_PROXY_CACHE.label: Reverse proxy cache

PROXY_CACHE_PATH_ZONE_SIZE.help: Maximum size of cached metadata when caching proxied resources.
PROXY_CACHE_PATH_ZONE_SIZE.label: Reverse proxy cache zone size

PROXY_CACHE_PATH_PARAMS.help: Additional parameters to add to the proxy_cache directive.
PROXY_CACHE_PATH_PARAMS.label: Reverse proxy cache params

PROXY_CACHE_METHODS.help: HTTP methods that should trigger a cache operation.
PROXY_CACHE_METHODS.label: Reverse proxy cache methods

PROXY_CACHE_MIN_USES.help: The minimum number of requests before a response is cached.
PROXY_CACHE_MIN_USES.label: Reverse proxy cache minimum uses

PROXY_CACHE_KEY.help: The key used to uniquely identify a cached response.
PROXY_CACHE_KEY.label: Reverse proxy cache key

PROXY_CACHE_VALID.help: Define the caching time depending on the HTTP status code (list of status=time), separated with spaces.
PROXY_CACHE_VALID.label: Reverse proxy cache valid

PROXY_NO_CACHE.help: Conditions to disable caching of responses.
PROXY_NO_CACHE.label: Reverse proxy no cache

PROXY_CACHE_BYPASS.help: Conditions to bypass caching of responses.
PROXY_CACHE_BYPASS.label: Reverse proxy bypass

REVERSE_PROXY_CONNECT_TIMEOUT.help: Timeout when connecting to the proxied resource.
REVERSE_PROXY_CONNECT_TIMEOUT.label: Reverse proxy connect timeout

REVERSE_PROXY_READ_TIMEOUT.help: Timeout when reading from the proxied resource.
REVERSE_PROXY_READ_TIMEOUT.label: Reverse proxy read timeout

REVERSE_PROXY_SEND_TIMEOUT.help: Timeout when sending to the proxied resource.
REVERSE_PROXY_SEND_TIMEOUT.label: Reverse proxy send timeout

antibot.name: Antibot
antibot.description: Bot detection by using a challenge.

ANTIBOT_URI.help: Unused URI that clients will be redirected to to solve the challenge.
ANTIBOT_URI.label: Antibot URL

ANTIBOT_RECAPTCHA_SCORE.help: Minimum score required for reCAPTCHA challenge.
ANTIBOT_RECAPTCHA_SCORE.label: reCAPTCHA score

ANTIBOT_TIME_RESOLVE.help: Maximum time (in seconds) clients have to resolve the challenge. Once this time has passed, a new challenge will be generated.
ANTIBOT_TIME_RESOLVE.label: Time to resolve

ANTIBOT_TIME_VALID.help: Maximum validity time of solved challenges. Once this time has passed, clients will need to resolve a new one.
ANTIBOT_TIME_VALID.label: Time valid

realip.name: Real IP
realip.description: Get real IP of clients when BunkerWeb is behind a reverse proxy / load balancer.

USE_REAL_IP.help: Retrieve the real IP of client.
USE_REAL_IP.label: Use real ip

REAL_IP_FROM.help: List of trusted IPs / networks, separated with spaces, where proxied requests come from.
REAL_IP_FROM.label: Real IP from

REAL_IP_FROM_URLS.help: List of URLs containing trusted IPs / networks, separated with spaces, where proxied requests come from.
REAL_IP_FROM_URLS.label: Real IP from URLs

REAL_IP_HEADER.help: HTTP header containing the real IP or special value proxy_protocol for PROXY protocol.
REAL_IP_HEADER.label: Real IP header

REAL_IP_RECURSIVE.help: Perform a recursive search in the header container IP address.
REAL_IP_RECURSIVE.label: Real IP recursive

CORS_ALLOW_ORIGIN.help: Allowed origins to make CORS requests : PCRE regex or *.
CORS_ALLOW_ORIGIN.label: Allowed origins

CORS_DENY_REQUEST.help: Deny request and don't send it to backend if Origin is not allowed.
CORS_DENY_REQUEST.label: Deny request

brotli.name: Brotli
brotli.description: Compress HTTP requests with the brotli algorithm.

BROTLI_TYPES.help: List of MIME types that will be compressed with brotli.
BROTLI_TYPES.label: MIME types

BROTLI_COMP_LEVEL.help: The compression level of the brotli algorithm.
BROTLI_COMP_LEVEL.label: Compression level

USE_CLIENT_CACHE.help: Tell client to store locally static files.
USE_CLIENT_CACHE.label: Use client cache

CLIENT_CACHE_EXTENSIONS.help: List of file extensions, separated with pipes that should be cached.
CLIENT_CACHE_EXTENSIONS.label: Extensions that should be cached by the client

CLIENT_CACHE_ETAG.help: Send the HTTP ETag header for static resources.
CLIENT_CACHE_ETAG.label: ETag

CLIENT_CACHE_CONTROL.help: Value of the Cache-Control HTTP header.
CLIENT_CACHE_CONTROL.label: Cache-Control header

dnsbl.name: DNSBL
dnsbl.description: Deny access based on external DNSBL servers.

CUSTOM_SSL_CERT.help: Full path of the certificate or bundle file (must be readable by the scheduler).
CUSTOM_SSL_CERT.label: Certificate path

CUSTOM_SSL_KEY.help: Full path of the key file (must be readable by the scheduler).
CUSTOM_SSL_KEY.label: Key path

DISABLE_DEFAULT_SERVER.help: Close connection if the request vhost is unknown.
DISABLE_DEFAULT_SERVER.label: Disable default server

REDIRECT_HTTP_TO_HTTPS.help: Redirect all HTTP request to HTTPS.
REDIRECT_HTTP_TO_HTTPS.label: Redirect HTTP to HTTPS

AUTO_REDIRECT_HTTP_TO_HTTPS.help: Try to detect if HTTPS is used and activate HTTP to HTTPS redirection if that's the case.
AUTO_REDIRECT_HTTP_TO_HTTPS.label: Auto redirect HTTP to HTTPS

ALLOWED_METHODS.help: Allowed HTTP and WebDAV methods, separated with pipes to be sent by clients.
ALLOWED_METHODS.label: Allowed methods

SERVE_FILES.help: Serve files from the local folder.
SERVE_FILES.label: Serve files

ROOT_FOLDER.help: Root folder containing files to serve (/var/www/html/{server_name} if unset).
ROOT_FOLDER.label: Root folder

SSL_PROTOCOLS.help: The supported version of TLS. We recommend the default value TLSv1.2 TLSv1.3 for compatibility reasons.
SSL_PROTOCOLS.label: HTTPS protocols

HTTP2.help: Support HTTP2 protocol when HTTPS is enabled.
HTTP2.label: HTTP2

OPEN_FILE_CACHE_ERRORS.help: Enable open file cache for errors
OPEN_FILE_CACHE_ERRORS.label: Open file cache errors

OPEN_FILE_CACHE_MIN_USES.help: Enable open file cache minimum uses
OPEN_FILE_CACHE_MIN_USES.label: Open file cache min uses

EXTERNAL_PLUGIN_URLS.help: List of external plugins URLs (direct download to .zip or .tar file) to download and install (URLs are separated with space).
EXTERNAL_PLUGIN_URLS.label: External plugin URLs

DENY_HTTP_STATUS.help: HTTP status code to send when the request is denied (403 or 444). When using 444, BunkerWeb will close the connection.
DENY_HTTP_STATUS.label: Deny HTTP status

bunkernet.name: BunkerNet
bunkernet.description: Share threat data with other BunkerWeb instances via BunkerNet.

badbehavior.name: Bad behavior
badbehavior.description: Ban IP generating too much 'bad' HTTP status code in a period of time.

BAD_BEHAVIOR_STATUS_CODES.help: List of HTTP status codes considered as 'bad'.
BAD_BEHAVIOR_STATUS_CODES.label: Bad status codes

BAD_BEHAVIOR_BAN_TIME.help: The duration time (in seconds) of a ban when the corresponding IP has reached the threshold.
BAD_BEHAVIOR_BAN_TIME.label: Ban duration (in seconds)

BAD_BEHAVIOR_THRESHOLD.help: Maximum number of 'bad' HTTP status codes within the period of time before IP is banned.
BAD_BEHAVIOR_THRESHOLD.label: Threshold

BAD_BEHAVIOR_COUNT_TIME.help: Period of time (in seconds) during which we count 'bad' HTTP status codes.
BAD_BEHAVIOR_COUNT_TIME.label: Period (in seconds)
